https://tmrev.io/movie/84924-Deadtime Stories 2 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/37LhyOhpauaCQSpaKSuirbLSToP.jpg An anthology of three horror stories presented by George A. Romero. In "Gorge" hikers are trapped in a cave-in must make a gruesome choice. In "On Sabbath Hill," a woman is driven to suicide but remains to torment her lover. In "Dust," a security guard is driven to murderous measures to use a strange dust that cures his wife's cancer. Deadtime Stories 2
